News.headline: Kids For a Quid: York City vs. Dagenham & Redbridge
News.page_title: Kids For a Quid: York City vs. Dagenham & Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Kids For a Quid: York City vs. Dagenham & Redbridge
News.short_description: York City are offering home and away fans kids for a quid for this Saturday's National League fixture at Bootham Crescent
News.description:
If you're looking to be travelling up to York City, the Minstermen will be offering kids age of 11 and under tickets for just £1.00.

Children aged 11 years and under will be able to attend the match against York City on Saturday 19th November for just £1.00.

Any full paying adult will be able to purchase a maximum of two tickets each for the reduced price.

For more ticket information about York City click here.
